task.question: Where did Adam and Eve live? (Genesis 2:8)
Which two trees grew in the midst of the garden? (Genesis 2:9)

choices.choice: The tree of death and the tree of joy and despair
The tree of life and the tree of death
The tree of knowledge of good and evil and the tree of joy and despair
The tree of life and the tree of knowledge of good and evil

task.answer: The tree of life and the tree of knowledge of good and evil

task.question: Which tree bore fruit that God forbade Adam and Eve to partake of ? (Genesis 2:16-17)

choices.choice: The tree of knowledge of good and evil
The tree of joy and despair

task.answer: The tree of knowledge of good and evil

task.question: What would NOT happen to anyone who would partake of such fruit?  (Genesis 3:16-19)

choices.choice: They would know for themselves the difference between right and wrong
They would be able to bear children

task.question: The animal who deceived Eve represents: (Genesis 1:20-23)

choices.choice: The spirits of Eve's unborn children

task.question: What did the deceptive animal convince Eve to do? (Genesis 3:1-6)
What did Adam do after Eve obeyed the animal and transgressed against the Lord's commandment? (Genesis 3:6)

choices.choice: He also transgressed against the Lord's commandment

task.answer: He also transgressed against the Lord's commandment

task.question: Why did Adam hide himself from the Lord? (Genesis 3:10)

choices.choice: He was embarrassed because he realized he was naked
He wanted to see if he could outwit the Lord
He wanted the Lord to prove to him that He can see all
He was ashamed of his wife's transgression

task.answer: He was embarrassed because he realized he was naked

task.question: What did the Lord NOT do as a result of the disobedience of Adam and Eve? (Genesis 3:16-19)

choices.choice: Give them the ability to feel emotion
Cause them to work the ground for food
Cast them out of Eden and His presence
